Interface TriangleStrip

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TriangleMesh
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexedTriangleStrip
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip, IndexedTriangleStripImpl

    public interface TriangleStrip
extends TriangleMesh
    A mesh composed of triangle strips.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PointList getStrip(int index)
      Returns the points of the specified strip.
      int getStripCount()
      Returns the number of strips this mesh is composed of.

      • Methods inherited from interface hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.TriangleMesh

        iterateTriangles

    • Method Detail

      • getStripCount

        int getStripCount()
        Returns the number of strips this mesh is composed of.
        Returns:
        the number of strips

      • getStrip

        PointList getStrip(int index)
        Returns the points of the specified strip.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the strip to return
        Returns:
        the points of the specified strip, containing at least three points. Each three consecutive points form a triangle (i.e. points (0, 1, 2), points (1, 2, 3) etc.).
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid

      • getStripLength

        int getStripLength(int index)
        Returns the number of points making up the specified strip.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the strip
        Returns:
        the number of points in the strip
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid
